statements: SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_performance > 0.8;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_time FROM shipment_tracking ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered' AND carrier_performance < 0.8;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_performance FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_performance BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7;
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status='delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_performance > 0.8 ORDER BY delivery_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_shipments FROM shipment_tracking WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_performance FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status='in-transit' ORDER BY carrier_performance ASC;
SELECT AVG(carrier_performance) as avg_performance, MAX(delivery_time) as latest_delivery FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status='completed';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_time FROM shipments WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT carrier_name, on_time_percentage FROM carriers WHERE on_time_percentage > 95;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_id, delivery_time, status FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT carrier_id, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY carrier_id;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_id, delivery_time, status FROM shipments WHERE carrier_id = 1;
SELECT carrier_name, on_time_percentage FROM carriers ORDER BY on_time_percentage DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_id, delivery_time, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM carriers WHERE on_time_percentage > 0.8 ORDER BY carrier_name ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_id, delivery_time FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT id, tracking_number, delivery_time FROM shipments WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT carrier_name, status FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_times WHERE delivery_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT carrier_name, on_time_delivery_rate, performance_rating FROM carrier_performance WHERE on_time_delivery_rate > 90;
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT tracking_number, carrier_name, delivery_time FROM shipments WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT carrier_name, AVG(on_time_delivery_rate) AS avg_on_time_rate FROM carrier_performance GROUP BY carrier_name HAVING AVG(on_time_delivery_rate) > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM shipments LEFT JOIN delivery_times ON shipments.id = delivery_times.shipment_id WHERE delivery_times.delivery_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT carrier_name, performance_rating FROM carrier_performance ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rate DESC, late_delivery_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, from_location, to_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, to_location, from_location, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT carrier_name, on_time_delivery_count, delayed_delivery_count FROM carrier_performance WHERE on_time_delivery_count > 100;
SELECT carrier_name, contact_name, contact_phone FROM carriers WHERE carrier_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, to_location FROM shipments WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_time, estimated_time FROM delivery_times ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT carrier_id, carrier_name, on_time_delivery_count FROM carrier_performance WHERE delayed_delivery_count > 5;

SELECT carriers.carrier_id, carriers.carrier_name, carriers.contact_name, carrier_performance.on_time_delivery_count FROM carriers JOIN carrier_performance ON carriers.carrier_id = carrier_performance.carrier_id WHERE carriers.contact_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT carrier_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_time FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT carrier_id, COUNT(shipment_id) as total_shipments FROM performances GROUP BY carrier_id;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%'
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipments WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT carrier_name, address FROM carriers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT route_id, origin_location_id, destination_location_id FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_status, delivery_time FROM performances JOIN shipments ON performances.shipment_id = shipments.shipment_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
